t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t = t - 1
    s = input()
    g = s[0]
    r = ''
    h = 0
    j = 0
    k = 0
    for i in s:
        if g == i:
            h = h + 1
        else:
            r = r + g + str(h)
            g = i
            h = 1
    r = r + g + str(h)
    if len(r) < len(s):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    st = input()
    s = ''
    i = 0
    while i < len(st):
        j = i
        while j < len(st) and st[j] == st[i]:
            j += 1
        s += st[i] + str(j - i)
        i = j
    print('YES' if len(st) > len(s) else 'NO')

t = int(input())
while t:
    s = input()
    n = len(s)
    c = 0
    s = s + ')'
    r = ''
    for i in range(n):
        if s[i] == s[i + 1]:
            c += 1
        else:
            r += s[i] + str(c + 1)
            c = 0
    print('YES') if len(r) < n else print('NO')
    t -= 1

turns = int(input())
for turn in range(turns):
    st = input()
    temp = st[0]
    fs = ''
    c = 0
    for i in range(0, len(st)):
        if temp == st[i]:
            c += 1
            temp = st[i]
        else:
            fs += temp
            fs += str(c)
            c = 1
            temp = st[i]
    fs += str(st[len(st) - 1])
    fs += str(c)
    if len(fs) < len(st):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    s = input()
    arr = []
    ans = 0
    countr = 0
    a = s[0]
    countr = countr + s.count(s[0])
    arr.append(countr)
    countr = 0
    for i in range(1, len(s)):
        countr = 0
        if a != s[i]:
            countr = s.count(s[i])
            a = s[i]
            arr.append(countr)
    for j in range(len(arr)):
        a = str(arr[j])
        ans = ans + len(a) + 1
    if ans >= len(s):
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    s = str(input())
    i = 0
    ans = ''
    while i < len(s):
        j = i + 1
        c = 1
        while j < len(s) and s[j] == s[i]:
            c += 1
            j = j + 1
        ans += s[i] + str(c)
        i = j
    if len(ans) < len(s):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
